items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice sweaters
items.body: Love the color order a size medium fits perfect. Quality is great thick and warm. Order one for my husband size extra large fits great. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the money.
items.body: They all fit very well. High quality well made sweater. Was warm and comfy. Family looked great in Christmas picture. Thank you. Read more
items.author: ross bowman

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cheap
items.body: I was very disappointed in the quality of this sweater. It feels and looks cheap. The design was cute; but, not necessarily excited to use. I felt it looked like something you can buy in a discount store (ie: DD's) at a JcPenney/Target price. I didn't think it was worth it. Read more
items.author: R.R.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits Perfectlyâ€¦ Looks Exactly Like The Pictures
items.body: I got the ouansyltg Family Christmas Sweaters Ugly Funny Reindeer Snowflake Long Sleeve Holiday Xmas Knitted Pullover Tops (Men, XX-Large, Reindeer-black) because I needed something festive for the holiday photos and it arrived exactly as pictured. It fits perfectly in the XX-Large I orderedâ€¦ the sleeves, the chest, the length all matched the listing and my expectations. The reindeer and snowflake print looks true to the picturesâ€¦ the pattern is clear, the colors pop on the black background, and folks actually noticed it at the holiday get-together. Itâ€™s light enough to layer under a coat if youâ€™re heading out, but it still reads like a proper festive pullover in photos. My only real note is the fabricâ€¦ itâ€™s on the thin side compared with thicker knit holiday sweaters. That doesnâ€™t hurt the look or fit, but if you want something heavy and super warm you might want a heavier knit. For me the thinness made it comfortable indoors and easy to move around in while still looking the part. â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€ RATING LEGENDâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€ â­â­â­â­â­ 5 Stars = Nailed itâ€¦ exactly as advertised or even better â­â­â­â­ 4 Stars = Solidâ€¦ but somethingâ€™s off, mis-represented, or overpriced â­â­â­ 3 Stars = Mehâ€¦ not terrible, but not worth the money or time â­â­ 2 Stars = Yikesâ€¦ functional but major issues, buyer beware â­ 1 Star = Absolute trashâ€¦ should not exist Read more
items.author: Nio Nyx

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars May start to pill
items.body: This sweater is really comfortable and soft. The sizing is accurate, and the design is really cute. It is a medium thickness, providing a moderate amount of warmth. My one concern is that I have only worn it once and the fabric is looking like it is going to wear really quickly. The sleeves are looking a little old. I haven't washed it yet either. The color is very bright. The red is a candy apple red which is fine but it feels a little brighter than a Christmas red. Read more
items.author: Bananas

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute sweater
items.body: This is a great fall sweater. The coloring and designs are beautiful. The sweater is a little thinner than I would normally wear this time of year but it is perfect to wear in my office. The fit is as expected and the sleeve length is perfect. The stitching is well done and it is currently listed with coupon for only $22. The fabric is nice and soft and getting softer with each wash. Read more
items.author: BML

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars High quality and super warm
items.body: This sweater is thick and warm. This is one of my favorite sweaters because it is so soft and cozy. My picture is of the sweater after I washed it three times. I am 5â€˜7â€œ and 160 pounds. I ordered the medium. It fit perfectly! There are no snags, unraveling, or fray. This is a high-quality item. Read more
items.author: Dee

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: kids Elk-red, Men Heart-red, kids Reindeer-red, Women Heart-black, Women Heart-red, Women Reindeer-green, kids Reindeer-black, Men Reindeer-black, Women Elk-red, kids Elk-black, Women Elk-black, kids Elk-green, Women Reindeer-red, Men Elk-black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
